alert.note: Alert for Gallatin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 8:39PM EDT until May 20 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR OHIO...SWITZERLAND AND WESTERN GALLATIN COUNTIES... At 839 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located from near Rising Sun to near Florence, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Vevay, Warsaw, Florence, Fairview, Patriot, Ethridge, Center Square, Markland, East Enterprise, Allensville, Quercus Grove, Mount Sterling, Jacksonville, US Route 42 at State Route 184 and Aberdeen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
